--- title: "DAGs and potential outcomes" date: "2022-09-19" --- ## Readings - {{< fa podcast >}} Prologue and at least one of the four acts from [This American Life, "Gardens of Branching Paths," episode #691, January 10, 2020](https://www.thisamericanlife.org/691/gardens-of-branching-paths) - {{< fa book >}} Chapter 3 in *Impact Evaluation in Practice* [@wb-eval] - {{< fa book >}} Chapters 8, 9, and 10 in *The Effect* [@Huntington-Klein:2021] ### Potential outcomes, ATEs, and CATEs example page - The [example page on potential outcomes, ATEs, and CATEs](/example/po-ate-cate.qmd) shows how to use R to calculate ATEs and CATEs ## Slides The slides for today's lesson are available online as an HTML file. Use the buttons below to open the slides either as an interactive website or as a static PDF (for printing or storing for later). You can also click in the slides below and navigate through them with your left and right arrow keys. :::{.callout-tip} **Fun fact**: If you type ? (or shift + /) while going through the slides, you can see a list of special slide-specific commands. ::: ## Videos ## In-class stuff Here are all the materials we'll use in class: - [**Session 5 FAQ slides**](/slides/05-class.html) ([PDF](/slides/05-class.pdf)) ### Confounding, unblocked
